title: Eto'o and Messi Barcelona FC soccer jersey
content:
Hi friends

somebody can help me to id the font used for these both jerseys of the Barcelona FC  
or maybe something closer to that font

thank

hernando

[http://i42.photobucket.com/albums/e331/king-soccer/red%20ant/BarzaHunice...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126045949/http:/i42.photobucket.com/albums/e331/king-soccer/red%20ant/BarzaHunicef-9.jpg "http://i42.photobucket.com/albums/e331/king-soccer/red%20ant/BarzaHunicef-9.jpg")

[http://i42.photobucket.com/albums/e331/king-soccer/red%20ant/NewBarzaEuf...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126045949/http:/i42.photobucket.com/albums/e331/king-soccer/red%20ant/NewBarzaEufaH19.jpg "http://i42.photobucket.com/albums/e331/king-soccer/red%20ant/NewBarzaEufaH19.jpg")
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content: See [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126045949/http:/typophile.com/node/14367). Not this season’s kit but same thinking applies.

yes i know Conor , but maybe there is some font closer not exactly the same but some shapes can be looks like the original font, sometimes these font are custumized for the FC company.

see you

hernando

DaFont is an unrivalled resource of free (if somewhat ugly) Techno fonts.

[Nasalization](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126045949/http:/www.dafont.com/nasalization.font?nb_ppp=50&text=ETOO+MESSI)  
 [Airstrip Four](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126045949/http:/www.dafont.com/airstrip-four.font?nb_ppp=50&text=ETOO+MESSI)  
 [Usuzi](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126045949/http:/www.dafont.com/suzuki.font?nb_ppp=50&text=ETOO+MESSI)

among [other possibilities](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126045949/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=303&page=1&nb_ppp=50&text=ETOO+MESSI). I can’t vouch for their quality though.

There are also some finer specimens out there.

[Digital Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126045949/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/digital-sans/) by [Elsner+Flake](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126045949/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Elsner%2BFlake)

[Propane](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126045949/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sparkytype/propane/) by [SparkyType](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126045949/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/SparkyType)

[Alphaville](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126045949/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/alphaville/) by [ShinnType](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126045949/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/ShinnType)

[Neo Family](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126045949/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=Neo+Tech) by Sebastian Lester
